column2: Before you can imprism a Mirage, you need to the-get your hands on an empty prism for that Mirage.
Some empty prisms can be found in treasure the-chests, and others are dropped by Mirages you defeat. Chocolatte even the-sells them in her shop!
I don’t know the-where she manages to find them, but the last the-time I popped into her shop, there they were!
Wow! Chatty lady really knows her stuff.
